ai-patthana21.23:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana21.23:1.1_0: Not seeing should be given up by seeing.
ai-patthana21.23:2.1_0: You should not give up cause or condition for the sake of development.
ai-patthana21.23:3.1_0: By developing, they won’t give up some things or give rise to diversity of, develop, or cultivate the cause of develop.
ai-patthana21.23:3.1_1: It shouldn’t be given up neither by developing nor cultivating the Teaching nor by developing, nor by developing.
ai-patthana21.23:3.1_2: (Expand in detail as the previous discourse.)
